title: SQLCOLUMN Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLCOLUMN Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
ALTER COLUMN
The
ALTER COLUMN
command is used to change the data type of a column in a table.
The following SQL changes the data type of the column named "BirthDate" in 
the "Employees" table to type year:
Example
ALTER TABLE Employees
ALTER COLUMN BirthDate 
  year;
DROP COLUMN
The
DROP COLUMN
command is used to delete a column in an 
existing table.
The following SQL deletes the "ContactName" column from the "Customers" table:
Example
ALTER TABLE Customers
DROP COLUMN ContactName;

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
Example
content_sections.code:
ALTER TABLE Customers
DROP COLUMN ContactName;

quiz.question:
What is ALTER COLUMN

command?
options: used to change the data type of a column in a table

used to delete a column in an 
existing table
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of ALTER COLUMN
The
ALTER COLUMN
command is 'used to change the data type of a column in a table'.

used to delete a column in an

summary: This tutorial covers SQLCOLUMN Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLCOLUMN Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLCOLUMN Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
